inclusion.criterion: Infants were eligible if they were born before 33 weeks gestational age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: required supplemental oxygen at 36 weeks gestational age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: were discharged home after neonatal intensive care
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Neonates who had major congenital anomalies
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient presented with severe 'exploding' headache after hitting her head, diagnosed with AVM and discharged home.
